item.title: Quickly Experience the Theme
item.description: This article describes how to quickly experience the seven theme. Prerequisites Install Hugo , with a version requirement of >= 0.124.0. Install Go . Install Node.js . Clone Repositorygit clone https://github.com/mrhelloboy/seven.git Install Dependenciescd seven/exampleSite hugo mod npm pack npm install Run Hugo Serverhugo server Open BrowserAccess http://localhost:1313 in your browser.
